divs: Sighting Detailscoming south on interstate 31 made a right turn on interstate 47 heading west. place is bakers corner just west of 47. saw a light coming down I thought it was a plane coming in for landing. i leaned forward to get an idea what direction it was to the right side of my car. i was looking thru my windshild. looking up I saw a red light about 40 ft up and it changed to a bright light then to a bluish light. this light had abought 3 to 4 ft diameter and i could see it was resessed. thats when i noticed the red light was above and to the rear of the car. at that time the lights blinked off. i was trying to locate them when i looked in the mirrow and saw a vehicle with one light coming up behind me. i proceded driving that vehicle followed me. when i got to interstate 421 the vehicle was no longer there. i thought it may have been a tower at that location. i went back a few days later no tower. there is a few towers in the area but none had the shape of lights that i saw. what ever it was seemed to have stopped right above us and the trees. it bothered me that i couldn't get a better look thats why i went back to the area. my brother and i had another incident in 1959 or 1960 thats why i guess i didn't feel threatend.
